item.title: About
item.description: Just like you, weâ€™ve grown tired of slow and unreliable internet packages. The big players donâ€™t see an economic value in investing in our region, and standing alone weâ€™re not capable of changing the status quo. So, listen to us and let us join forces. Our Story One of our cofounders is in Stobrec, the other in Podstrana. For years in row thereâ€™s been no alternatives to the slow and unreliable internet in Podstrana.
